name: Fluent Bit to OpenSearch
description: Собирает логи Home Assistant и Supervisor и отправляет их в OpenSearch

options.parsers:
[PARSER]
    Name docker
    Format json
    Time_Key time
    Time_Format %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%L
    Time_Keep On

[PARSER]
    Name syslog
    Format regex
    Regex ^(?<time>[^ ]* [^ ]*) (?<host>[^ ]*) (?<service>[^:]*): (?<message>.*)$
    Time_Key time
    Time_Format %b %d %H:%M:%S
